title: Losing 25 useful peers within 11 seconds

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
This node was running fine on Goerli when it lost 25 useful peers within 11 seconds.

"Useful" peers can be identified by a reputation > 100 (see logs) . The reputation starts at 100 and with every useful response is incremented by 1 (is decremented for other behaviour).

Grepped from the log:
```
~ % grep -i termin goodPeersDisconnecting.log
```

The attached file called "goodPeersDisconnecting.log" contains the log for the 11 seconds cleaned by grepping for the entries concerning the connections that are disconnecting.
The attached file called "goodPeersDisconnectingFull.log" is the full log contents for that time.

[Uploading... goodPeersDisconnecting.log]

[Uploading... goodPeersDisconnectingFull.log]
I have the original log file available, but it is 11GB in size.
